# Issue #041: Production Launch Preparation

**Phase:** Phase 5 - Production Launch  
**Week:** 29+  
**Component:** Full-stack  
**Estimated Effort:** 10 days  
**Priority:** Critical  
**Labels:** phase-5, production, launch, deployment

## Description
Complete all production launch preparation activities including load testing, security penetration testing, disaster recovery testing, documentation completion, training materials, and support runbooks.

## Acceptance Criteria

### Testing
- [ ] Load testing (1000+ concurrent users)
- [ ] Stress testing (failure scenarios)
- [ ] Security penetration testing
- [ ] Disaster recovery testing
- [ ] Backup and restore procedures verified
- [ ] Failover testing
- [ ] Data migration testing

### Documentation
- [ ] Complete API documentation
- [ ] Administrator guide
- [ ] User guide
- [ ] Deployment guide
- [ ] Troubleshooting guide
- [ ] Architecture documentation
- [ ] Security documentation
- [ ] Compliance documentation

### Training & Support
- [ ] Training materials created
- [ ] Video tutorials recorded
- [ ] Support runbooks written
- [ ] FAQ documentation
- [ ] Support ticket system setup
- [ ] Escalation procedures defined

### Infrastructure
- [ ] Production environment provisioned
- [ ] SSL certificates installed
- [ ] DNS configuration
- [ ] CDN configuration
- [ ] Backup systems configured
- [ ] Monitoring and alerting active
- [ ] Log aggregation configured
- [ ] Security hardening complete

### Launch Preparation
- [ ] Go-live checklist created
- [ ] Rollback plan documented
- [ ] Communication plan ready
- [ ] Support team trained
- [ ] On-call rotation scheduled
- [ ] Performance baselines established
- [ ] Success metrics defined

## Dependencies
- Depends on: All Phase 1-4 components

## Deliverables
- Load test results
- Security audit report
- Complete documentation suite
- Training materials
- Support runbooks
- Launch checklist
- Go-live approval
